https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8NfC32RyRkgAFzQuW42PW3TigDv.jpg Set in Chellanam, Kochi, the story revolves around the death of Vavachan Mesthiri in a coastal village. It showcases the events that unfold between two evenings and looks at death from different perspectives. Ee.Ma.Yau.
